subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Even though he is just 21, Rafael Nadal knows that his rivalry with Roger Federer has already become part of tennis lore. The two will meet Sunday in the French Open final.
snippet: Even though he is just 21, Rafael Nadal knows that his rivalry with Roger Federer has already become part of tennis lore. The two will meet Sunday in the French Open final.
